description:
This Token permits you to be part of ILLUMINATIOTA. There will only ever be maximum of 666 members. We give our active members until 6th of March 2023 time and new members one week time to get this NFT before you will get kicked. You have the chance to re-enter with one week time to get the NFT. If you want to become part of our secret society, simply join our space and get the member token. We are open for everyone.  If you no longer wish to be part of our secret society, you can sell your member token, ILLUMINATIOTA x Shimmer Member Token has just a small royalty fee! Buying this member token also allows you to get card no.000 (backside) and no. 001. Only owners of our member token have access to card no. 000 and 001.

Member token holders will receive 13666 NATI.

Backside: 

Card no. 000 Illuminatus - ILLUMINATIOTA logo


On the card: 

Card no. 001 Annuit Coeptis - Novus Ordo Seclorum :

2022 - Chapter 1010 - As the time approaches,  we  enter the new decade and we can witness what our ancestors have gone through to hand us the key to the New World Order over.  We didn't see this coming, but feel blessed. Time to open the real future, history and science books. And so we will enforce enlightment. If you wonder why now? It has been 24 years since the revelations. We are working for two years on the final phase of enforcing chapter 13, verse 18 from the Old Book of Revelation.

And if you ask when, it is already too late.

..............................................

illuminatiota.org
name: ILLUMINATIOTA x Shimmer Member Token
